Key Match Events: Georgia scored the opening goal after only 93 seconds
Georgia's second goal came from a penalty kick in the 57th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Kvaratskhelia had spoken before the game of how much he wanted Ronaldo's shirt
Post-Match Reflections: Kvaratskhelia described the win as the best day in his life
Miscellaneous Highlights: Georgia's victory marked their debut at a major tournament
Others: Portugal's Cristiano Ronaldo was still without a goal at Euro 2024
